sentences.en: According to the shipping documents, transshipment and partial shipment are permitted.
sentences.cn: 根据装船单据, 允许转船和分批装运.

sentences.en: All transport transshipment charges will be included in the C . I. F . price.
sentences.cn: 所有的转运费用都包括在到岸价格里面了.

sentences.en: As there is no direct liner to the destination, please allow transshipment.
sentences.cn: 因为无直达班轮, 请允许转船.

sentences.en: Because transshipment adds expense as well as risk of damage and pilferage.
sentences.cn: 转船会增加费用,另外还会增加偷窃、损坏的风险.

sentences.en: Give Chapter and Verse and Author for Transshipment , copy or other using.
sentences.cn: 转载请注明出处、作者, 谢谢合作.

sentences.en: Good, thank you. By the way, is it possible to avoid transshipment for future deliveries?
sentences.cn: 好, 谢谢, 对了, 以后交货能不能不用转船运输?

sentences.en: I'm totally against the proposal of making transshipment at Hong Kong.
sentences.cn: 我完全反对在香港转船的建议.

sentences.en: Industry: tourism, banking, e - commerce , cement, oil refining and transshipment.
sentences.cn: 工业: 旅游, 银行业务, 电子商务, 水泥, 石油精炼和中转.

sentences.en: Loading Port & Destination: From with transshipment and partial shipments allowed.
sentences.cn: 装运口岸和目的地准许分批与转船.

sentences.en: Partial shipment or transshipment shall be permitted unless otherwise stated on the face hereof.
sentences.cn: 应准许分批付运和转运，除非本合同正面另有规定。

sentences.en: Partial shipments are allowed and transshipment is allowed.
sentences.cn: 分批装运和转运是被允许的。

sentences.en: Please amend your L / C to allow partial shipment and transshipment.
sentences.cn: 请修改你方信用证,允许分批装运和转运.

sentences.en: Please note that partial shipments and transshipment are ( not ) permitted.
sentences.cn: 请注意,我方 ( 不 ) 允许部分装运或转运.

sentences.en: Shipment during May with partial shipment and transshipment allowed, sellers option.
sentences.cn: 装运期由卖方选择,允许分批装运.

sentences.en: Shipment from Shanghai to Singapore without partial shipment/transshipment.
sentences.cn: 从上海装运到新加坡，不允许分批/转运。

sentences.en: There are risks of damage to the goods during transshipment.
sentences.cn: 在转船期间有货物被损坏的风险.

sentences.en: Transshipment is allowed Through Bill of Lading are presented.
sentences.cn: 如提交联运提单,转运答应.

sentences.en: We prefer direct sailings, as transshipment adds to the risk of damage and also delays arrival to some extent.
sentences.cn: 我们宁愿直航，因为转运增加破损风险，也会因某些方面延迟抵达。

sentences.en: Your request that transshipment is make at hong kong is acceptable.
sentences.cn: 在香港转船的要求可以接受.
